quote: 'Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma — which is living with the results of other people's thinking. And most important, have the courage to follow your heart and intuition. They somehow already know what you truly want to become. Everything else is secondary.' ― Steve Jobs

section-1.title: About me
section-1.description: I am a front-end developer with a year of practical experience. My experience includes working with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Vue. Over the past year, I have been involved in the development of several projects, which has allowed me to dive deeper into these technologies and enhance my skills. I remain responsible and ready to tackle challenging tasks. I aspire to further growth and development in the field of front-end development, and I'm confident that my experience and skills can bring valuable contributions to your team.

bio-description.2019: Graduated from K. Satpayev KazNITU University with a degree in technical engineering.
bio-description.2022: Graduated from an online IT programming school.

section-3.title: I like
section-3.description: Music, Playing video-games, Coding, Learning new
